title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 571.4 - Determination of navigability of river or stream
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 571.4 - Determination of navigability of river or stream

State Regulations

The agency will, at the request of any person having a
legal interest in property and contemplating land use or development or
subdivision thereon subject to the shoreline restrictions, determine whether a
given river or stream or portion thereof is navigable for the purposes of
section 806 of the Adirondack Park Agency Act and these
regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
571.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
